short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight an Serial Number or Directory API ID and search Google Admin for matching devices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to search for devices in Google Admin using the right click menu on highlighted text.
